phrs.translation: 棘状鳞, 支骨, 是什么意思

sentences.sentence: Control of power and "service" are bilateral and takes the form of the two fulcra.
sentences.translation: “权力控制”和“服务”是双边的，采取两种支骨的形式。

sentences.sentence: "Control of power"and "service"is bilateral and takes form of the two fulcra…
sentences.translation: 控权和服务是双向的，共同构成了行政法学理论基础的两个支点。
